casebody.data:
Second Department,

March, 1974

(March 15, 1974) In the Matter of Thomas Turner et al., Petitioners, v. Narcotic Addiction Control Commission et al., Respondents.—

Proceeding pursuant to article 78 of the CPLR to compel the respondents to return the petitioners to the custody of NACC to permit them to complete their “ narcotic sentence.” Application denied, proceeding dismissed without costs, on the merits. Gulotta, P. J., Hopkins, Martuseello, Brennan and Benjamin, JJ., concur.
